 az aks create \
--resource-group RG-SolutionB \
--name exam-k8s \
--location northeurope \
--node-count 1 \
--node-vm-size Standard_L2as_v4 \
--nodepool-name agentpool \
--os-sku Ubuntu \
--zones 1 2 3 \
--kubernetes-version 1.32.7 \
--enable-managed-identity \
--generate-ssh-keys \
--attach-acr examprepcr \
--tier free

 sqlcmd -S examprep-sql-server.database.windows.net \
       -d DB \
       -U tonytech \
       -P "New_1234512345" \
       -C \
       -i variant-b/db/create-structures.sql

Server is not found or not accessible. Check if instance name is correct and if SQL Server is configured to allow remote connections. For more information see SQL Server Books Online..

 export ACR_PASSWORD="$(az acr credential show --name examprepcr --query 'passwords[0].value' -o tsv | tr -d '\r\n')"
 az container create \
--resource-group RG-SolutionB \
--name exam-container \
--image examprepcr.azurecr.io/app4:v1 \
--dns-name-label exam-app4 \
--ports 80 \
--os-type linux \
--cpu 1 \
--memory 1.5 \
--location northeurope \
--registry-login-server examprepcr.azurecr.io \
--registry-username examprepcr \
--registry-password "$ACR_PASSWORD"

 az lock delete \
--name Exam-Lock \
--resource-group RG-SolutionB \
--resource-name examprepcr \

 az group delete --name RG-SolutionB --yes --no-wait
